Text:
tasmanian devil.....

more affectionately known as Taz,he`s an absolute unstoppable
whirling,twirling,hurtling,landscape eating motion machine,full of mischeif and always hungry

episodes include

the dog,the turtle story
like father,like son
frights of passage
war and pieces
airbourne airhead
it`s no picnic
kee-wee ala king
